parameters.title: Related Findings in the Analyst Queue:

data.message:
This Risk Finding under investigation is composed of many related findings and intermediate findings.

You can browse all these related findings on a risk timeline in the Overview Tab.

Please select a response below to manage these findings in the Analyst Queue while you continue to work on the investigation.

{0}

responses.responsePrompt: Do you want to close these individual findings?

content.template:
Based on the positive response of the user prompt to close findings, all related findings have been closed in the Analyst Queue with Disposition as "Closed - As part of investigation". The context of all those individual findings is available in this investigation.


All related findings key information has been added to the "Events" tab as evidence.

Closed Findings as part of this Investigation:


| Finding ID | Status |
| --- | --- |
%%
| {0} | Closed |
%%



There may be other "Intermediate Findings" contributing to this investigation, please review them in the Overview tab

parameters.title: Analyst decision to close related findings

parameters.content: Based on the negative response of the user prompt to close findings, all related findings have NOT been closed in the Analyst Queue.
parameters.title: Analyst decision to NOT close related findings

content.template:
There are no individual findings in this investigation as it is comprised of only "Intermediate Findings".


To review the Intermediate Findings, check the "Overview" tab

parameters.title: Related Intermediate Findings in the Analyst Queue:

53.userCode:
# Write your custom code here...
    #phantom.debug(get_finding_or_investigation_1_result_item_0)
    #phantom.debug(type(get_finding_or_investigation_1_result_item_0))
    import json
    import re

    included_findings__finding_id = []
    included_findings__intermediate_finding_id = []
    final_result = {
        "finding_ids": [],
        "intermediate_finding_ids": []
    }

    # Loop through each dictionary in the list
    for item in get_finding_or_investigation_1_result_item_0:
        for long_key_string in item.keys():
            matches = re.findall(r'(\w+)="(.*?)"', long_key_string)
            for key, value in matches:
                if key in ["finding_ids", "intermediate_finding_ids"]:
                    final_result[key].append(value)

    included_findings__finding_id = final_result["finding_ids"]
    included_findings__intermediate_finding_id = final_result["intermediate_finding_ids"]
    
    included_findings__finding_id = str(included_findings__finding_id)
    included_findings__intermediate_finding_id = str(included_findings__intermediate_finding_id)
    
    phantom.debug(included_findings__finding_id)
    phantom.debug(included_findings__intermediate_finding_id)
